/* admin.selectAdmListCnt : 목록 개수 */ SELECT COUNT(NO_PDCT_SRAL) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT A.NO_PDCT_SRAL, A.CD_CTGR, B.NM_CTGR FROM HABT_PDCT A INNER JOIN HABT_ADMN_CTGR B ON ( B.CD_CTGR = A.CD_CTGR ) WHERE A.CL_KO_ENG = 'K' AND A.YN_ELMN = 'N' AND A.CD_CTGR IN ('P4001','P4002')
AND (B.NM_CTGR LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%' OR A.NM_PDCT LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%' OR A.ATRB_1 LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%' OR A.ATRB_2 LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%' OR A.ATRB_3 LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%')
AND B.NM_CTGR LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%'
AND A.NM_PDCT LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%'
AND A.ATRB_1 LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%'
AND A.ATRB_2 LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%'
AND A.ATRB_3 LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%'
)

/* admin.selectBizList 제품 목록 */ SELECT cdPdCtUse, ynNtc, noPrdtSral, nmPdCt, dntCrtn, cdCtgr FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NO_PDCT_SRAL DESC) AS NUM, CASE CD_PDCT_USE WHEN '01' THEN '인쇄/포장' WHEN '02' THEN '테이프' WHEN '03' THEN '일반합지' WHEN '04' THEN 'Thermal용 합지' WHEN '05' THEN '기능성' WHEN '06' THEN 'EVA' ELSE '' END cdPdCtUse, CASE YN_NTC WHEN 'Y' THEN '게시' WHEN 'N' THEN '게시 중지' ELSE '' END ynNtc, A.NO_PDCT_SRAL AS noPrdtSral, A.NM_PDCT AS nmPdCt, TO_CHAR(A.DNT_CRTN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS dntCrtn, B.NM_CTGR as cdCtgr, ATRB_2 as atrb_2_en, ATRB_3 as atrb_3_en, ATRB_4 as atrb_4_en FROM HABT_PDCT A INNER JOIN HABT_ADMN_CTGR B ON ( B.CD_CTGR = A.CD_CTGR ) WHERE A.CL_KO_ENG = 'K' AND A.YN_ELMN = 'N' AND A.CD_CTGR IN ('P4001','P4002')
AND (B.NM_CTGR LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%' OR A.NM_PDCT LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%' OR A.ATRB_1 LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%' OR A.ATRB_2 LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%' OR A.ATRB_3 LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%')
AND B.NM_CTGR LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%'
AND A.NM_PDCT LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%'
AND A.ATRB_1 LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%'
AND A.ATRB_2 LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%'
AND A.ATRB_3 LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%'
ORDER BY A.NO_PDCT_SRAL DESC, A.DNT_CRTN DESC ) C WHERE NUM BETWEEN #sNum# AND #eNum#

/* admin.selectBizList 제품 목록 */ SELECT cdPdCtUse, ynNtc, noPrdtSral, nmPdCt, dntCrtn, cdCtgr, atrb_2, atrb_3, atrb_4, atrb_2_en, atrb_3_en, atrb_4_en, cdPdCtUseEn FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NO_PDCT_SRAL DESC) AS NUM, CASE CD_PDCT_USE WHEN '01' THEN '인쇄/포장' WHEN '02' THEN '테이프' WHEN '03' THEN '일반합지' WHEN '04' THEN 'Thermal용 합지' WHEN '05' THEN '기능성' WHEN '06' THEN 'EVA' ELSE '' END cdPdCtUse, CASE YN_NTC WHEN 'Y' THEN '게시' WHEN 'N' THEN '게시 중지' ELSE '' END ynNtc, A.NO_PDCT_SRAL AS noPrdtSral, A.NM_PDCT AS nmPdCt, TO_CHAR(A.DNT_CRTN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS dntCrtn, B.NM_CTGR as cdCtgr, A.ATRB_2 as atrb_2, A.ATRB_3 as atrb_3, A.ATRB_4 as atrb_4, A.ATRB_2_EN as atrb_2_en, A.ATRB_3_EN as atrb_3_en, A.ATRB_4_EN as atrb_4_en, CD_PDCT_USE_EN as cdPdCtUseEn FROM HABT_PDCT A INNER JOIN HABT_ADMN_CTGR B ON ( B.CD_CTGR = A.CD_CTGR ) WHERE A.CL_KO_ENG = 'K' AND A.YN_ELMN = 'N' AND A.CD_CTGR IN ('P4001','P4002')
AND (B.NM_CTGR LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%' OR A.NM_PDCT LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%' OR A.ATRB_1 LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%' OR A.ATRB_2 LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%' OR A.ATRB_3 LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%')
AND B.NM_CTGR LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%'
AND A.NM_PDCT LIKE '%' || #searchData# || '%'
